ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] -=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-   **From the  Moderator**
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Just so you know, the SK board I run has a pretty decent turnout, and most of the High profile SKs read it and/or post regularly. If you d rather send
ygData.messageBody:
Dave Mylastname wrote:
>
> Ok, Im just gonna get straight to the point here...
>
> Would NE1 like to moderate the message board?
> I havent done ne thing to this board since... a couple years ago? ;)
> Heh, I started this, then I had to quit cause of "groundation", lol,
> and I never came back. I forgot all about this message board and
> just let it be, little to be known to grow into a huge community. So
> If NE1 wants to be moderator for this board read the below.
>
> I would like these requirements:
> 1.Gotta be one kewl/nice person, heheh
> 2.Gotta be the man in EQ for Shadowknights
> 3.Suck up, lol, jk, dont do that!
>
> Do the following:
> 1.Email me directly
> 2.Say stuff why I should pick you
>

Just so you know, the SK board I run has a pretty decent turnout,
and most of the "High profile" SKs read it and/or post regularly.
If you'd rather send people over here, we already get anywhere from
a dozen to fifty posts a day, and usually good stuff (i.e. not many
class gripes) The stratics message board, moderated by Paragon the
Black, is also a very good SK board.

Xilith
http://www.eqforge.com/shadowknight
